name: TLNT SHRDR - Sneak Peek
description:
Mobile bullet hell game where time moves when you move.

Lots of bullets to dodge, and lots of patterns to figure out.

This is a pre-release version of my first mobile game, set to be released on the Google Play Store. 

This is a test build so it includes Unity Test Ads.

Feedback would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you very much for your time.

Stay fresh!
